description: Modifies a prompt in your prompt library. Include both fields that you want to keep and fields that you want to replace. For more information, see Prompt management in Amazon Bedrock and Edit prompts in your prompt library in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: promptIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the prompt.

parameters.name: variants
parameters.description: A list of objects, each containing details about a variant of the prompt. (dict) --- Contains details about a variant of the prompt. additionalModelRequestFields (document) --- Contains model-specific inference configurations that aren't in the inferenceConfiguration field. To see model-specific inference parameters, see Inference request parameters and response fields for foundation models. genAiResource (dict) --- Specifies a generative AI resource with which to use the prompt. agent (dict) --- Specifies an Amazon Bedrock agent with which to use the prompt. The ARN of the agent with which to use the prompt. inferenceConfiguration (dict) --- Contains inference configurations for the prompt variant. text (dict) --- Contains inference configurations for a text prompt. maxTokens (integer) --- The maximum number of tokens to return in the response. stopSequences (list) --- A list of strings that define sequences after which the model will stop generating. (string) --- temperature (float) --- Controls the randomness of the response. Choose a lower value for more predictable outputs and a higher value for more surprising outputs. topP (float) --- The percentage of most-likely candidates that the model considers for the next token. metadata (list) --- An array of objects, each containing a key-value pair that defines a metadata tag and value to attach to a prompt variant. (dict) --- Contains a key-value pair that defines a metadata tag and value to attach to a prompt variant. For more information, see Create a prompt using Prompt management. The key of a metadata tag for a prompt variant. The value of a metadata tag for a prompt variant. modelId (string) --- The unique identifier of the model or inference profile with which to run inference on the prompt. The name of the prompt variant. Contains configurations for the prompt template. chat (dict) --- Contains configurations to use the prompt in a conversational format. inputVariables (list) --- An array of the variables in the prompt template. (dict) --- Contains information about a variable in the prompt. name (string) --- The name of the variable. Contains messages in the chat for the prompt. (dict) --- A message input or response from a model. The content in the message. (dict) --- Contains the content for the message you pass to, or receive from a model. cachePoint (dict) --- Creates a cache checkpoint within a message. Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type text (string) --- The text in the message. The role that the message belongs to. system (list) --- Contains system prompts to provide context to the model or to describe how it should behave. (dict) --- Contains a system prompt to provide context to the model or to describe how it should behave. cachePoint (dict) --- Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type text (string) --- The text in the system prompt. toolConfiguration (dict) --- Configuration information for the tools that the model can use when generating a response. toolChoice (dict) --- Defines which tools the model should request when invoked. any (dict) --- Defines tools, at least one of which must be requested by the model. No text is generated but the results of tool use are sent back to the model to help generate a response. auto (dict) --- Defines tools. The model automatically decides whether to call a tool or to generate text instead. tool (dict) --- Defines a specific tool that the model must request. The name of the tool. An array of tools to pass to a model. (dict) --- Contains configurations for a tool that a model can use when generating a response. For more information, see Use a tool to complete an Amazon Bedrock model response. cachePoint (dict) --- Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type toolSpec (dict) --- The specification for the tool. description (string) --- The description of the tool. The input schema for the tool. json (document) --- A JSON object defining the input schema for the tool. text (dict) --- Contains configurations for the text in a message for a prompt. cachePoint (dict) --- A cache checkpoint within a template configuration. Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type inputVariables (list) --- An array of the variables in the prompt template. The message for the prompt. The type of prompt template to use.

nested_params.name: additionalModelRequestFields
nested_params.description: Contains model-specific inference configurations that aren't in the inferenceConfiguration field. To see model-specific inference parameters, see Inference request parameters and response fields for foundation models.

nested_params.name: genAiResource
nested_params.description: Specifies a generative AI resource with which to use the prompt.

nested_params.name: agent
nested_params.description: Specifies an Amazon Bedrock agent with which to use the prompt.

nested_params.name: agentIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ARN of the agent with which to use the prompt.

nested_params.name: inferenceConfiguration
nested_params.description: Contains inference configurations for the prompt variant.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: Contains inference configurations for a text prompt.

nested_params.name: maxTokens
nested_params.description: The maximum number of tokens to return in the response.

nested_params.name: stopSequences
nested_params.description: A list of strings that define sequences after which the model will stop generating.

nested_params.name: temperature
nested_params.description: Controls the randomness of the response. Choose a lower value for more predictable outputs and a higher value for more surprising outputs.

nested_params.name: topP
nested_params.description: The percentage of most-likely candidates that the model considers for the next token.

nested_params.name: metadata
nested_params.description: An array of objects, each containing a key-value pair that defines a metadata tag and value to attach to a prompt variant.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key of a metadata tag for a prompt variant.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of a metadata tag for a prompt variant.

nested_params.name: modelId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the model or inference profile with which to run inference on the prompt.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the prompt variant.

nested_params.name: templateConfiguration
nested_params.description: Contains configurations for the prompt template.

nested_params.name: chat
nested_params.description: Contains configurations to use the prompt in a conversational format.

nested_params.name: inputVariables
nested_params.description: An array of the variables in the prompt template.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the variable.

nested_params.name: messages
nested_params.description: Contains messages in the chat for the prompt.

nested_params.name: content
nested_params.description: The content in the message.

nested_params.name: cachePoint
nested_params.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a message.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The text in the message.

nested_params.name: role
nested_params.description: The role that the message belongs to.

nested_params.name: system
nested_params.description: Contains system prompts to provide context to the model or to describe how it should behave.

nested_params.name: cachePoint
nested_params.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The text in the system prompt.

nested_params.name: toolConfiguration
nested_params.description: Configuration information for the tools that the model can use when generating a response.

nested_params.name: toolChoice
nested_params.description: Defines which tools the model should request when invoked.

nested_params.name: any
nested_params.description: Defines tools, at least one of which must be requested by the model. No text is generated but the results of tool use are sent back to the model to help generate a response.

nested_params.name: auto
nested_params.description: Defines tools. The model automatically decides whether to call a tool or to generate text instead.

nested_params.name: tool
nested_params.description: Defines a specific tool that the model must request. No text is generated but the results of tool use are sent back to the model to help generate a response.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the tool.

nested_params.name: tools
nested_params.description: An array of tools to pass to a model.

nested_params.name: cachePoint
nested_params.description: Creates a cache checkpoint within a tool designation.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_params.name: toolSpec
nested_params.description: The specification for the tool.

nested_params.name: description
nested_params.description: The description of the tool.

nested_params.name: inputSchema
nested_params.description: The input schema for the tool.

nested_params.name: json
nested_params.description: A JSON object defining the input schema for the tool.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the tool.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: Contains configurations for the text in a message for a prompt.

nested_params.name: cachePoint
nested_params.description: A cache checkpoint within a template configuration.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Indicates that the CachePointBlock is of the default type.

nested_params.name: inputVariables
nested_params.description: An array of the variables in the prompt template.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the variable.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The message for the prompt.

nested_params.name: templateType
nested_params.description: The type of prompt template to use.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the prompt.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the prompt was created.

nested_items.name: customerEncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key to encrypt the prompt.

nested_items.name: defaultVariant
nested_items.description: The name of the default variant for the prompt. This value must match the name field in the relevant PromptVariant object.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the prompt.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the prompt.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the prompt.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the prompt was last updated.

nested_items.name: variants
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each containing details about a variant of the prompt.

nested_items.description: Contains model-specific inference configurations that aren't in the inferenceConfiguration field. To see model-specific inference parameters, see Inference request parameters and response fields for foundation models.
